text: To Eallum Folke.

Leofan menn, understandað georne, eallswa eow mycel ðearf is, þæt ge eowres cristendomes gescead witan, & ge eac geleornian þæt ge cunnan þæt ælc cristen man mid rihte cunnon sceall; þæt is,pater noster & credo in Deum.
And butan ge hit on Leden geleornian magan, geleorniað hit on Englisc þus: Eala ure fæder þe on heofonum eart, a sy ðin nama ecelice gebletsod.
& ðin ricedom ofer us rixie symble, & ðin willa gewyrðe swa swa on heofonum eac swa on eorðan.
Geunn us to þissum dæge dæghwamlices fostres.
And us gemildsa swa swa we miltsiað þam ðe wið us agyltaþ; & ne læt ðu us costnian ealles to swyðe, ac alys us fram yfele, amen.
Gloria patri et filio et spiritui sancto.
A sy lof & wuldor fæder & suna & halgum gaste, swa swa on fruman wæs & gyt is & symble bið in ealra worulda woruld, amen.
Leofan men, utan don swa us mycel þearf is, habban anrædne geleafan & fulne hiht on urne Drihten.
And se ðe þurh Ledenspræce rihtne geleafan understandan ne cunne, geleornige huru on Englisc & cweðe þus gelome:Credimus in unum Deum, patrem et filium et spiritum sanctum.
We gelyfað on ænne God ælmihtigne þe ealle þingc gesceop & geworhte.
And we gelyfað & georne witan þæt Crist Godes sunu to mannum com for ealles mancynnes ðearfe.
And we gelyfað þæt hine clæne mæden gebære, Sancta Maria, þe næfre nahte weres gemanan.
And we gelyfað þæt he mycel geðolode & stiðlice þrowode for ure ealra neode.
And we gelyfað þæt hine man on rode ahenge & hine to deaðe acwealde & hine syððan on eorðan bebyrigde.
And we gelyfað þæt he to helle ferde & ðærof gehergode eal þæt he wolde.
And we gelyfað þæt he syððan of deaðe arise.
And we gelyfað þæt he æfter þam to heofonum astige.
And we gelyfað & georne witan þæt he on domes dæg to ðam miclan dome cymð, & we gelyfað þæt ealle deade men sculon þonne arisan of deaðe & þone myclan dom ealle gesecan.
And we gelyfað þæt ða synfullan sculon þanon on an to helle faran & ðær a syððan mid deoflum wunian on byrnendum fyre & on ecan forwyrde, & ðæs ænig ende ne cymð æfre to worulde.

And we gelyfað þæt ða godan & wel cristenan þe her on worulde Gode wel gecwemdon þonne on an sculon into heofonum faran & ðær syððan wununge habban mid Gode sylfum & mid his englum a on ecnesse, amen.
Ælc Cristen man ah mycle þearfe þæt he ðis wite & ðisses rihtlice gelyfe; & se ðe his credan elles ne cunne, geleornige huru þæt he hine ðus cunne.
And utan don swa us mycel þearf is, habban æfre rihtne geleafan & fulne hiht on God ælmihtigne & lufian hine ofer ealle oðre þing & his willan a wyrcan swa we geornost magan.
Þonne geleanað he hit us swa us leofost byð.
Him sy lof & wuldor aa butan ende, amen.
